explain: Sir Bradley Wiggins will attempt a significant cycling achievement by attempting to break the hour record on June 7th at London's Olympic Velodrome, which will attract a sold-out crowd of spectators. This event marks a significant milestone in his cycling career.

Sir Bradley Wiggins, a notable cyclist with four Olympic championships and 2012 Tour de France victory, aims to break the kilometer distance record in 60 minutes while competing at London's Olympic Velodrome in June.
